duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct basic research and analysis of state and local tax (SALT) issues
Utilize tax software for the completion of basic tax returns and other tax filings
Draft tax memoranda and other tax documents on various tax issues
Assist in drafting responses to notices from state taxing authorities
Complete basic research on federal and state tax issues
Participate in the preparation of tax presentations for client meetings
Utilize tax-related software in the completion of basic tax returns

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a Bachelors or Masters program in Accounting, Taxation, Finance, or relevant field, preferred
